channel.title: CVE Feed for Arcgis Enterprise Server -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Arcgis Enterprise Server -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-37694|2024-06-27T16:28:26.051630 -- arcgis%20enterprise%20server -- arcgis%20enterprise%20server
item.description: ArcGIS Enterprise Server 10.8.0 allows a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information because /arcgis/rest/services does not require authentication. NOTE: the supplier disputes the vulnerability information, and also objects to the assignment process (unsupported when assigned from incorrect CNA).
